attributes.action: make better the Elderley care and stop the abuse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my father recentley passed away and his last two years were horrific,in nursing home and hospital  there is not enough done for the elderley and not enough protection for the elderly and something needs to be done on the monitoring not just by a yearly inspection report ,I have first hand dealings on the complaints procedure and it just does not work needs more resource's and monitoring it is our duty to see that they live there lives out with dignity the era of the old age is fading fast and these are the people that made this country and i made a promise to my dad that i would try to make things better .To many elderley suffer at the hands of the so called proffesionals
